alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Dawson; Gosper; Hall; Howard; Kearney; Phelps; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 9:48PM CST until March 10 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Storm total accumulations ranging anywhere from 1 to 5 inches, with the lowest amounts mainly north of Interstate 80 and the highest amounts within counties along the Highway 6 corridor. * WHERE...Portions of south central Nebraska mainly between the Highway 92 and Highway 6 corridors. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions with reduced visibility. Most of the snow will fall overnight into Thursday morning, and will impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Although limited blowing and drifting snow is likely, sustained north-northeast winds will only average 10 to 15 MPH, keeping significant drifting from being a major issue.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Dawson; Gosper; Hall; Howard; Kearney; Phelps; Sherman
